SELECT A.IDX , A.TITLE , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REGDATE , A.COUNT , A.WRITER , B.CONTENTS_TITLE , B.CONTENTS_URL , B.GRADES FROM SPABOARD.TB_BOARD A INNER JOIN SPABOARD.TB_NETFLIX B ON A.IDX = B.BOARD_NO
WHERE B.CONTENTS_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTxt}, '%')
WHERE A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTxt}, '%')
WHERE A.WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTxt}, '%')
ORDER BY REGDATE DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{amount}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SPABOARD.TB_BOARD
WHERE CONTENTS_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTxt}, '%')
WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTxt}, '%')
WHERE WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTxt}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SPABOARD.TB_BOARD ( TITLE , CONTENTS , REGDATE , UPDDATE , COUNT , WRITER ) VALUES ( #{title} , #{contents} , now() , now() , #{count} , #{writer} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX , A.TITLE , A.CONTENTS , A.REGDATE , A.COUNT , A.WRITER , B.GRADES , B.CONTENTS_TITLE , B.CONTENTS_URL , C.FILE_IDX , C.ORIGIN_NAME FROM SPABOARD.TB_BOARD A INNER JOIN SPABOARD.TB_NETFLIX B ON A.IDX = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN SPABOARD.TB_FILE C ON A.IDX = C.BOARD_NO WHERE A.IDX = #{idx}
SELECT FILE_PATH , ORIGIN_NAME FROM SPABOARD.TB_FILE WHERE FILE_IDX = #{fileIdx}
